metadata.title: USN-4866-1 -- Netty vulnerabilities
metadata.description: It was discovered that Netty incorrectly implements HTTP/2. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service. (CVE-2019-9512, CVE-2019-9514, CVE-2019-9515, CVE-2019-9518)  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-4866-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  libnetty-java - 1:4.1.7-4ubuntu0.1+esm1 Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro
